nodes.text: K33 Division was a missile combat unit in the CIS Army. It was one of the primary combatants during the First Battle of Geonosis and throughout the Clone Wars.

K33 Division supplied numerous units in a wide variety of roles. However, it set itself apart from other droid divisions in that its droids utilized enhanced self-aware programming along with upgraded artillery and torpedo systems to crush enemies from range. The various unit types included Persuader-class droids, Hailfire-class droids, DSD1 dwarf spider droids often working in conjunction with the division's OG-9 homing spider droids. B1-Series battle droids operated both AATs and STAPs during battles to harass enemy troops. All units working together combined into a force that was considerably formidable.

The K33 Division employed a modified version of the Hailfire droid with heavy artillery blasters, and moderate defensive enhancements. Toward the end of the Clone Wars, K33 Division was also provided with tri-droids known for ripping apart both infantry and vehicles with ease.
For the Battle of Kashyyyk, K33 added HMP gunships to the division in their assault on Kachirho.
